initialized().notice: Gets if the contract is initialized.

userdoc.notice: This contract is used as a base contract for most most of the contracts in the platform.It allows contracts to have access to the platform settings, and common modifiers.It implements the reentrancy guard from Open Zeppelin and the TInitializable pattern.
